Green MP shoplifting allegations: Expulsion? Resignation? Exoneration? Duvauchelle Shears: Open final win breaks five-year drought for Lionel Taumata https://www.nzherald.co.nz/the-country/news/duvauchelle-shears-open-final-win-breaks- Five-year-drought-for-lionel-taumata/UUV3NJRLJRFK5L6DSMFVB6XIVQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/the-country/news/duvauchelle-shears-open-final-win-breaks- Five-year-drought-for-lionel-taumata/UUV3NJRLJRFK5L6DSMFVB6XIVQ/ Doug LaingFormer No 1-ranked senior shearer has finally cracked a win in the open class. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 05:00:13 +0000 South Island shearer Lionel Taumata, at his last senior competition in 2019. On Saturday he had his first open final win, at the Duvauchelle Shears.
Private investigator offers to help solve Countdown car park crash mystery https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/private-investigator-offers-to-help-solve-countdown-carpark-crash-mystery/RS6PUSGMCBFFXGMBVAKHNNR6AI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/private-investigator-offers-to-help-solve-countdown-carpark-crash-mystery/RS6PUSGMCBFFXGMBVAKHNNR6AI/ Melissa NightingaleA private investigator has offered his company's services for free. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 05:00:00 +0000 Kelly Hamilton said she felt "defeated" after Countdown refused to give her CCTV footage of her car getting damaged, due to "privacy obligations".
Ailing Taradale football manager David Greene honoured for 37 years of service with tribute match https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/walking-miracle-ailing-taradale-football-manager-honoured-for-37-years-of-service/A2BC4MGBLRGV7LHYWRKFPAJMRE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/walking-miracle-ailing-taradale-football-manager-honoured-for-37-years-of-service/A2BC4MGBLRGV7LHYWRKFPAJMRE/ Hamish BidwellDavid Greene has lived with cancer for all of his 54 years. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 04:57:19 +0000 The great and the good of Taradale football gathered to pay tribute to longtime first team manager David Greene on Saturday.

Change is imminent to Hamilton City’s kerbside recyclinghttps://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/change-is-imminent-to-hamilton-citys-kerbside-recycling/EXEEV2FUMJBEZE5KNCS3SWQ56Y/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/change-is-imminent-to-hamilton-citys-kerbside-recycling/EXEEV2FUMJBEZE5KNCS3SWQ56Y/ Recycling changes across the country mean only plastic types 1,2 and 5 will be collected.
